Class Profile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Profile

  • public class Profile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class saves the mapped buttons and generates the text for the config files. It also saves the JTextField for the buttons in the GUI.
    Author:
    Jonas Cosandey
    See Also:
    JTextField

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      This array contains all values of the commands.

      This array contains all values of the keys.
      javax.swing.JTextField[] keysTextFiled
      Array of all keyfields.

    • Field Detail

      • keysTextFiled

        public javax.swing.JTextField[] keysTextFiled
        Array of all keyfields. As example: b:3=Ctrl+S. That is the part with b:3. This is a JTextField.
        See Also:
        JTextField

      • commandsTextFiled

        public javax.swing.JTextField[] commandsTextFiled
        Array of all commandfields. As example: b:3=Ctrl+S. That is the part with Ctrl+S. This is a JTextField.
        See Also:
        JTextField

      • Profile

       java.lang.String[] keys,
       java.lang.String[] commands)
        Sets the instance variables.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the profile.
        keys - All keys read from the profile file.
        commands - All commands read from the profile file.
